masa_gadget_mod.config.category.all.name: All
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.autoSyncEn: Auto use pcaSyncProtocol to sync entity data
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.cacheConta: Cache container menu, minecraft will cache inventory data from server when open inventory
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.debug.name: debug
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.openConfig: A hotkey to open the in-game Config GUI
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.renderNext: Render next restock time on villager.
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.renderTrad: Render trade enchanted book text on villager.
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.renderVill: Render the tracking line of the villager to the home.
Render tracking line of villager to the job site.
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.renderZomb: Render zombie villager convert time on zombie villager.
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.searchMobS:
Search mob spawn point. Need set §6Despawn Sphere§r in minihud, 
and light check depends on §6lightLevelThresholdSafe§r in minihud
Don't search blocks in this list.
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.syncAllEnt: Use pcaSyncProtocol to sync all entity data.
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.betterEasy:
Easy place mode can open inventory (such as chest, hopper, etc.), 
and can use beacon.
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.disableLit: Disable easyPlace failure that annoying prompt window.
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.saveInvent: Use pcaSyncProtocol to sync inventory data to local and save to schematic
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.useRelativ: Save and load schematic use relative path
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.backportI1: Backport masa mod i18n support from 1.18.x
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.fastSwitch: Render drop down list widget, player can switch other masa's mod config gui quickly.
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.favoritesS: Users can favorite and filter their frequently used options.
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.fixConfigW: Use the length of getTranslatedGuiDisplayName as widget width
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.fixSearchb: Fix searchbar input when press hotkey to open config gui.
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.optimizeCo: Make search support uppercase, translate text, and can use §6modified§r to search modified config
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.showOrigin: Show original config name when config gui display name no the same as original config name.
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.minihudI18: Minihud display text support i18n translate.
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.pcaSyncPro: Press §6inventoryPreview§r hotkey to use PCA sync protocol to sync Beehive
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.inventoryP: Inventory preview will render the output of comparator.
Player can use inventory preview to show the inventory of player and ender chest inventory

When player press the inventory preview hotkey, 
player can use the mouse wheel to select items (player can view the enchantment information), and when player select the shulker box in the chest, player can press the mouse scroll to preview the items in the box
Inventory preview support shulker box item entity.
Inventory preview will preview the trade offer list of merchant
When toggle inventory preview, use pcaSyncProtocol to sync block entity data and entity data from server, such as chest, villager
Open inventory to sync inventory data when use inventory preview
Inventory preview get the hit result from cache, to reduce lag when render
masa_gadget_mod.config.option.restockWit:
Automatically craft required items in the 2x2 crafting grid 
when Tweakeroo can't find the item. This feature requires ItemScroller。
Recipe indexes in ItemScroller recipe storage. Note: only 2x2 recipes are supported.
